radiographic_examinations.findings: Left basilar atelectasis. Small left pleural effusion, slightly decreased in volume. Mild right basilar atelectasis. Surgical sutures throughout the stomach. Residual air and fluid containing collection measuring approximately 3.1 x 7.4 cm. A pigtail catheter remains within this collection. No new fluid collections within the upper abdomen. Previously described liver cysts are unchanged.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Small residual air and fluid containing collection has slightly decreased in size from 3.4 x 7.7 cm to 3.1 x 7.4 cm.
